head.title: Generate barcodes in {{FileFormatUp}} documents with {{ProgLang}}
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} API enables developers to easily generate and embed barcode images into documents and emails dynamically.

header.title: Add barcodes to {{FileFormatUp}} documents using our {{EnvNameShort}} API
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers full support for creating and embedding barcodes dynamically in {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Overview of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is built to help you generate documents and reports by integrating data from a wide variety of sources. Populate documents with text or numerical data, create charts, tables, and lists, or insert images and barcodes on the fly. Use advanced markup to place data precisely where needed. Supports over 50 formats, including PDF, MS Office files, and emails.

more_features.title: Generate documents by filling templates with data
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} is designed to simplify the creation of documents in popular formats. Add charts, lists, tables, hyperlinks, images, and barcodes using advanced templates and markup.

feature_1.title: Create reports from business data
feature_1.content: Our API efficiently populates documents in popular office formats using data from sources like JSON, XML, and CSV.

feature_2.title: Use visual elements to display data
feature_2.content: {{ProdShortName}} supports embedding native elements such as lists, tables, and charts, along with text, hyperlinks, images, and dynamically generated barcodes.

feature_3.title: Insert data anywhere in the document
feature_3.content: Use LINQ-based syntax to place data exactly where it's needed. Arrays can be inserted using for-each loops, and formatting (e.g., color) can be customized programmatically.

feature_4.title: Supports a wide range of formats
feature_4.content: Process popular file formats like MS Office, OpenOffice, PDF, HTML, and various email formats. Embed one document into another as needed.

formats.title: Create reports in popular formats
formats.description: {{EnvName}} supports generating reports in over 50 formats, allowing you to seamlessly merge data and templates for outstanding results.

operations.title: Explore key features
operations.description: Our solution is designed to streamline your business document processing needs.

examples.comment_1: Insert this tag into your template to generate a barcode in the final document
examples.comment_4: Save the document with the generated barcode

steps.title: Steps to add a generated barcode to a {{FileFormatUp}} document

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to insert barcodes into templates in formats like {{FileFormatUp}}. Supports over 60 barcode types, including one-dimensional and two-dimensional formats.
content.step_1: Prepare a {{FileFormatUp}} template with barcode placeholders.
content.step_2: Retrieve data from any supported data source.
content.step_3: Configure additional properties like barcode size or resolution.
content.step_4: Save the template with the barcode as a new document.

code_1.title: How to generate a barcode dynamically
code_1.content: This example demonstrates embedding a dynamically generated barcode into a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_1: Use this template to insert a barcode into the document
code_1.comment_2: Specify the path to the template file
code_1.comment_3: Retrieve data from your chosen source
code_1.comment_4: Create a data source object with only the required data
code_1.comment_7: Save the final document with the embedded barcode
